specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Median annual salaries are for principal job and are rounded to nearest $1,000. Standard errors are rounded up to the nearest $500. Full time is based on working 35 or more hours per week. Residence location is based on reported living location on 1 February 2021.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Doctorate Recipients, 2021.
